uiitems

Class Background

  • java.lang.Object
    • uiitems.UIItem
      • uiitems.Background
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Background
extends UIItem
    a background class for the background of the window
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Background() 
      Background(java.lang.String path)
      creates a background object based on only the image path

      creates a background object based on the image path and a cover
      Background(java.lang.String path, double width, javafx.scene.paint.Color backgroundColor)
      creates a background object with a specified width and background color
      Background(java.lang.String path, double w, javafx.scene.paint.Color backgroundColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color cover)
      creates a background object with all attributes
